projects.title: Home Finder
projects.description: This project enables people to log in as users via email or google account to post their houses, with all data storing in Firebase.

projects.title: Btrust Official Website
projects.description: This is the official website of Btrust International Trade Inc., deployed on Shopify. It helps customers stay updated with the latest product prices, allows users to submit job applications directly on the site, and showcases the most recent flyers for promotions and events.

projects.title: Movie & TV Show Search
projects.description: Users can view recently popular movies on the front page and search for any movie or show they desire. By clicking on a movie's poster, they can access more detailed information.
